document_data.mainbody:
Bishop Braccio was one of the members of the Council of Ten in New Phlan in the mid–14 century DR. 
Braccio was the leader of the citys religious community
In the mid–14 century DR, Bishop Braccios office was nestled between two wings of Temple of Tyr, not far from the citys passenger docks. During the time Phlan was occupied by servants of Tyranthraxus, Braccios goal was to purify corruption from the Temple of Bane, located in the Old Phlan and inhabited by Banite cultists.
